Recreate your Tesla Arcade at home

Find your Tesla games, see where to buy on PC/console, and follow 3-step setups. Clear save-transfer guidance.

Games

  • Cuphead — Arcade title (mini-session friendly)
  • Fallout Shelter — Arcade title
  • The Battle of Polytopia — Arcade title

What about save games?

Tesla Arcade does not expose an official export of save data. Expect to start fresh, or use cloud-saves within the same store ecosystem on home platforms when available.
